body: This list contains vector control products that have been assessed by WHO and found to be acceptable, in principle, for procurement by UN and other international agencies and countries.
title: List of of vector control pre-qualified products
recommendation:
All cases of suspected malaria should have a parasitological test (microscopy or Rapid diagnostic test (RDT)) to confirm the diagnosis.
Both microscopy and RDTs should be supported by a quality assurance programme.
Good practice statement
